sentences.english: Each year, an estimated 500 billion to 1 trillion plastic bags are consumed worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 每年全球的膠袋使用量估計有5千億到1萬億個。

sentences.english: China has purchased US T-Bonds worth about 900 billion US dollars.
sentences.chinese: 中國已經購買了美國大約9千億美元的長期國債。

sentences.english: Long be heard this roar over endless realms, in the echoing of a thousand heartstrings .
sentences.chinese: 願這長嘯之聲響徹天地，在千億心絃間久久地迴盪。

sentences.english: There are an estimated 100 billion neurones that make up the brain's communication network.
sentences.chinese: 據估計，構成大腦的溝通網絡的神經元有一千億。

sentences.english: Total costs for the plan are estimated in the hundreds of billions of dollars.
sentences.chinese: 據估計，這項計劃的全部耗資將達到數千億美元。

sentences.english: We're going to have, already, $1.2 - trillion deficits, by estimates, and it's just begun.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經有1萬2千億美元的赤字，而這還只是開始。

sentences.english: The House just defeated a 700-billion-dollar financial industry bailout package.
sentences.chinese: 美國衆議員否決了七千億美元的經濟緊急援助方案。

sentences.english: One hundred billion would come from the military.
Imports for the first time exceeded $100b since last October.
sentences.chinese: 進口則是去年10月以來首次突破千億美元大關。

sentences.english: The eventual losses could run to several hundred billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 最終的資金損失，可能要達到千億數量級。

sentences.english: Hundreds of billons are being given to banks and insurance companies.
sentences.chinese: 數千億美元轉到了銀行和保險公司名下。

sentences.english: Where can the incarnation of billions, a plum tree a fangweng.
sentences.chinese: 何方可化身千億，一樹梅花一放翁。

sentences.english: "The costs of invasive species are so high, literally hundreds ofbillions of dollars a year, " Cmar says.
sentences.chinese: 入侵物種的代價非常高，每年差不多需要數千億美元。

definition: sum or volume of business transactions/turnover
employee/person employed in a trade or profession
strategic pass/barrier or mark (i.e. a level considered impressive, usually a round figure such as 10,000)/instrument of torture used to break limbs
surveyor's pole/post (used for a landmark)/CL:根[gen1]/(fig.) goal/model/benchmark
Gundam, Japanese animation franchise/Jean-Luc Godard (1930-), French-Swiss film director
up to/no less than/as much as
